about_me: I love learning, coding, and baking
my_journey_content:
I started my tech career in April 2020 as an IT Support Technician at a local company in Kokomo, Indiana. During this time, I gained hands-on experience and deepened my understanding of technology.

In April 2022, I was promoted to Software Engineer, where I began automating critical processes, developing applications, and optimizing business operations.

My journey has been filled with continuous learning, innovation, and exciting challenges that drive my passion for software development.
my_experience_content:
Software Engineer at BerryIt, Inc.

Automated key business processes with Python, reducing execution time by 25% and improving overall efficiency.

Designed, developed, and maintained software solutions using Python, JavaScript, C#, Flask, SQL, Docker, and more to address evolving business needs.

Led the development of a scalable desktop application for time tracking, improving concurrent user capacity from 5 to 60+ and reducing response time from 10 seconds to under 2 seconds.
what_i_know_content:
Proficient in: Python, Flask, Django, Docker, SQL (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MS SQL), Git, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and more.

Familiar with: Kotlin, Java, C#, Node.js, Express.js, Nginx, Redis, and related technologies.

Currently learning: React, Next.js, and Machine Learning with Python.
my_learning_approach_content:
Reading, Comparing, and Observing.

I dive deep into documentation and compare new knowledge with what I already knowâ€”like solving a puzzle! Additionally, watching others use tools and technologies enhances my learning experience.
my_short_term_goals_content: As a Software Engineer, I recognize the endless learning opportunities in tech. My current focus includes:
my_short_term_goals_list:
• Data Visualization and Analytics
  • Exploring Machine Learning
  • Enhancing UI/UX design skills
  • Contributing to open-source projects
